name: The Dutch East India Company: Self Portrait IV
name_original: The Dutch East India Company: Self Portrait IV
description:
Must be played with two people in the same room. In playing this game, each player takes the role of a human being controlling a beast. The players try to force the other off of the screen with projectiles and strategic manoeuvres. However, you must tend to your beast's well being, the beast is crucial to your survival.

Comments below about bugs/critiques would be appreciated!
